properties.areaDesc: Western Windham; Hamilton; Bennington; Northern Herkimer
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:44AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches
with locally higher amounts possible in the highest terrain.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Southern Green Mountains in Vermont and Northern
Herkimer and Hamilton counties in New York.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Both falling and
patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
